snippet.title: Dinosaur: Resurrection - Early Gameplay (subtitled; enable closed captioning)
snippet.description:
Early gameplay footage from the Japan-only PC first-person dungeon-crawl RPG "Dinosaur: Resurrection" by Nihon Falcom. I couldn't find any footage of this game on YouTube, save for the intro and the trailer, and some online friends of mine were curious about it, so I figured I'd remedy the situation by playing a bit of it with Fraps running, then uploading the results.

This footage was taken after a little over a half-hour of getting lost in the forest and almost dying (I had 3 HP left when I successfully made my way back to the town gate!), and covers up through the first boss battle.

I decided I'd take the time to translate and subtitle all the story dialogue, too, so those of you watching at home would have some idea what's actually going on. To see the subtitles, just enable closed-captioning on the video by clicking the icon on the bottom-right of the display, and toggling the "CC" so it's shaded in red.

Enjoy!
